previous.title: In 1901, we had the first billion dollar market cap. As of recent, we've reached the first trillion dollar market cap. What will be the first company to obtain a quadrillion dollar market cap, and why?

localize.title: 1901年，我们有了第一个10亿美元的市值。到最近为止，我们已经达到了第一个万亿美元的市值。第一家市值达到万亿美元的公司将是什么？为什么？

next.title:
We should just have Amazon and Walmart run the logistics for distributing the vaccine

Bezos would have this solved in 24 hrs

localize.full_text:
我们应该让亚马逊和沃尔玛负责分发疫苗的物流。

贝佐斯会在24小时内解决这个问题

我們應該讓亞馬遜和沃爾瑪負責分發疫苗的物流。
